alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 03 at 1:03PM CST until February 03 at 1:30PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST AND NORTHWESTERN ST. CHARLES PARISHES... At 102 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Taft, or near Hahnville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hahnville, Laplace, Reserve, Killona, Norco, Montz, Edgard, Destrehan, Taft, New Sarpy, St. Rose, Boutte and Luling. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 208 and 213, and between mile markers 215 and 221. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 2. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 10. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: St. Charles; St. John The Baptist
